name: Ultimate Ninja Dad
description:
This mini game was made in 72 hours for the Mini Jam 79 - Frogs (Limitation Only one level).

How to play

You are the frog daddy in charge of watching and defending the eggs from the merciless wasps.

Use the keys A, S, D or LEFT, DOWN, RIGHT arrows to kick
You can also play clicking the arrows if you with to play with mouse

I had the idea to make the game after watching this video
The Glass Frog: Ultimate Ninja Dad | Animal 24

""Males frogs are also very protective of their mates’ eggs. Females lay a mass of eggs (called a clutch) on the underside of leaves, sticking them in place with a jelly-like substance. Afterward, the females leave and the males go on guard duty. They watch the eggs 24/7 until they hatch, protecting them from enemies such as wasps. The frog has even been known to kick away wasps that get too close to the egg cluster!""
